sourcesContent:
import { Component } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Radio, Select, Layout } from 'antd'; import Utilities from '@/utilities'; const { Sider, Content } = Layout; class Add extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.utility = new Utilities(this); this.state = { ...this.utility.getImageState, selected: { images: null, category: null, city: null, region: null, village: null, metro: null, sellType: null, licence: null, ipoteka: null, roomAmount: null, apartmentFloor: null, buildingFloor: null, landAppointment: null, icareCixaris: null, belediyye: null, rentDuration: null, price: null, areaSize: null, aboutInfo: null, personalInformation: { email: null, phone: null, name: null, wp: null, call: null } }, sellTypeList: null, categoryList: null, cityList: null, regionList: null, villageList: null, metroList: null, landAppointmentList: null, rentDurationList: null, license: true, ipoteka: true, price: true, area: true, addition: { roomAmount: false, apartmantFloor: false, floorAmount: false, landAppointment: false, icare: false, belediyye: false, } } this.state.categoryList = this } render(h) { return (

Satıram Kirayə Verirəm {this.utility.selectGenerator("Kategoriya:", this.state.categoryList, "Category", null, null, true, false)} {this.utility.selectGenerator("Şəhər:", [], "City", null, null, true, false)} {this.utility.selectGenerator("Rayon:", [], "Region", null, null, true, false)} {this.utility.selectGenerator("Qəsəbə:", [], "Village", null, null, true, false)} {this.utility.selectGenerator("Metro:", [], "Metro", null, null, true, false)} {this.utility.numberGenerator("Otag:", "Daxil Edin", null, [])} {this.utility.numberGenerator("Menzil Mertebesi:", "Daxil Edin", null, [])} {this.utility.numberGenerator("Bina Mertebesi:", "Daxil Edin", null, [])} {this.utility.selectGenerator("Torpag Teyinati:", [], "LandAppointment", null, null, true, false)} {this.utility.checkBoxGenerator("Cixaris (Icare)", null)} {this.utility.checkBoxGenerator("Belediyye", null)} {this.utility.selectGenerator("Kirayə müddəti:", [], "RentType", null, null, true, false)} {this.utility.numberGenerator("Qiymət:", "Daxil Edin", null, [])} {this.utility.numberGenerator("Sahə:", "Daxil Edin", null, [])} {this.utility.textAreaGeneretor("Məlumat", "Ən azı 100 hərfdən ibarət olmalıdır", null)} {this.utility.checkBoxGenerator("Cixaris", null)} {this.utility.checkBoxGenerator("Ipoteka", null)} {this.utility.inputGenerator("E-mail:", "Daxil Edin", null, null)} {this.utility.inputGenerator("Nömrə:", "Daxil Edin", null, null)} {this.utility.inputGenerator("Ad:", "Daxil Edin", null, null)} {this.utility.checkBoxGenerator("WhatsApp", null)} {this.utility.checkBoxGenerator("Zəng", null)} {this.utility.imageUploadGenerator(this.state.fileList, this.state.previewVisible, this.state.previewTitle, this.state.previewImage)} Sider
) } categoryCallback = (value, options) => { let row = this.props.filter.categories.find(w => w.id == value); this.setState({ selected: { ...this.state.selected, category: value }, addition: { ...this.state.addition, roomAmount: row ? row.roomAmount : false, apartmantFloor: row ? row.floor : false, floorAmount: row ? row.floorAmount : false, landAppointment: row ? row.landAppointment : false, } }) } } export async function getStaticProps() { const res = await fetch('http://192.168.1.107:5566/api/bina/add') const filter = await res.json() return { props: { filter, }, } } export default Add;
